0: Great Service very accommodating the kids had a great time
I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend the hotel

All my best Elizabeth and Joel

Thank you Melville Mariot for making my granddaughters wedding so wonderful
1: The Fitness Center was decent and had what quite a few cardio pieces free weights a large pool

The cleaning service is quite superior as well
Yes the lobby has been renovated but the rooms are disgusting
less stressful thank you so much Tia
I would stay at this hotel again and would recommend it to friends and family
We went to another Mariot in Farmingdale
Clearly someone at the top hotel managers are doing an excellent job
Should you find yourself in Long Island needing somewhere to stay the Mariot Melville is a great choice
Our room was as expected comfortable clean and up to ours and Mariots standards
